title: Return of the Alfheim
description: Elin never meant to live a double life, but lately when she sleeps, she dreams, and somehow, defying all odds, these dreams keep building on each other. She finds herself questioning her dream life. Could it be real? The line between reality and dreams becomes blurred and finally broken. The dreams aren't just dreams. They're real. Elin faces the struggles of trying to survive and make sense of her dream life while still trying to piece together the fragments of her real life. As time passes, she discovers her mother has a few secrets that might just explain everything. Elin has to work fast to make sure that she does what is right in both worlds without losing herself in the process.
author: Elizabeth Allen Drysdale
